revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SkelFist}} {{doomwiki|A_SkelFist}} '''A_SkelFist'''
(no parameters)
The melee attack of Doom's [[Classes:Revenant|Revenant]]. This plays the sound ''"skeleton/melee"'' and performs a melee attack with a base damage of 6 multiplied by a random value between 1 and 10.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's Revenant.
Melee: SKEL G 0 [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL G 6 [[A_SkelWhoosh]] SKEL H 6 [[A_FaceTarget]] SKEL I 6 [[A_SkelFist]] goto See
[[category:Decorate Classic attack functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:SkelFist}}
